name: Pengu and the Popsicles
description:
The Controls are; up, down, left, right arrow keys to move and X to look at your inventory which currently just shows you how many popsicles you have.

Pengu and the Popsicles is just a short game with a rolling penguin looking for the popsicles scattered around the area, will you be able to find them all? Probably. So, yes!
When you want to learn, you start from the bottom, so I started by making a game using Pico-8. It's just a small project that I used to help me get used to Pico-8.
